item.title: Roasted vegetables. A retrospective
item.description: Roasting Vegetables is great! its a great way to get rid of those lingering vegetables and its simple and quick to do! I see it as a fridge cleaner and an easy way to make a simple side. (but i end up eating them on its own!) Prerequisites There are no hard and fast rules when it comes to this. But i like to add in At least one onion like vegetables.

item.title: How to get started with Hugo and GitHub
item.description: I am no expert I should start this by saying I started this website a good year ago and did nothing with it. I was adamant that I would do everything in wrought HTML ,lets just say that was a massive mistake. I ended up settling on a simple home page with a hugo blog to power the back-end. After multiple hiccups with finding a theme i had settled on Tokiwa for a while and all was well… that was until i tried blogging.

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi I am Jeet! I am a Student that is studying computer science at 6th form This is my Blog! Thats well and good but whats it about? I use Linux, and I cook, this is what I will write about when I find the time. I am constantly experimenting with new pieces of software and will probably write about them at some point. How can I berate you about how you are wrong?
